column2:
A treat that combines the flavors of common crustaceans and three types of fish. Double-click to feed this to your skimmer.

Gives bonus Mastery experience once per day.

Yes yes, it was a tragedy. But also an opportunity! Those dam pieces are historical artifacts!"
—Cin

This item only has value as part of a collection."
Cleanse Balthazar's reliquary so the magic may flow freely.
A recipe to make a Seraph Pearl Impaler.
Learn to use the jackal's sand to bolster allies when using Pounce, granting nearby allies a strong barrier.
A recipe to make ascended medium leggings with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A recipe to make ascended light gloves with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Carried by Justiciar Agatha in Saidra's Haven.
A recipe to make a Seraph Pearl Handcannon.
Double-click to choose from a set of food consumables.
Boosts and convenience items to help make your game time more efficient and enjoyable.
<c=@flavor>This armor attempts to channel the power of the envoys.</c>

Earned by completing legendary bounties in the Crystal Desert. Spend at the Tomb of Primeval Kings.

<c=@Flavor>These markers were used to commemorate great deeds in the Dynastic Era of ancient Elona.</c>
A recipe to make a Seraph Pearl Blunderbuss.
Complete a race event as an engineer in any Crystal Desert map.
Double-click to choose a recipe for crafting gear with the Seraph stat combination.
It's not clear what this is for, and it smells awful.
Expend the organ's ley-line magic purifying the surrounding area.
A recipe to make Seraph Draconic Legs.
A recipe to make an ascended heavy coat with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended shield with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A missive from Skimmer Trainer Ardra containing information on troop movements. Intended for delivery to Healer Ebele north of Arid Gladefields. Can be consumed for Mastery experience and karma.
Expend the organ's ley-line magic to blast yourself into the air.
Carried by Bandit Spirits in Doric Lumber Yard.
Fire multiple piercing blasts at your target.
A recipe to make a Seraph Pearl Broadsword.
A recipe to make a Seraph Pearl Needler.
A recipe to make ascended medium shoulders with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Unlocked a new griffon adventure nearby!
Purchase this relic from Groffmok in Desert Highlands.
Master the skimmer and learn to share the bonus from Nimble Recovery with all mounts.
Upon interrupting an enemy, gain up to 250 precision and ferocity for 4 seconds, depending on level. <c=@reminder>(Cooldown: 1 second)</c>
A recipe to make an ascended scepter with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Given by Priest Hakim in the Temple of Kormir for bringing him supplies from Priestess Karima.
Deal increased damage to foes at a lower health percentage than you. Conditions you apply to foes at a lower health percentage than you last longer.
You cannot mount while in combat.
A recipe to make an ascended short bow with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Learn to jump up much higher with the springer's movement ability, allowing you to reach new and previously unexplorable areas.
Use a fraction of the organ's ley-line magic to knock your target back. Then draw weapons and prepare to fight.
Acquire this relic from the last spearmarshal.
Master the jackal and learn to share the bonus from Enhanced Evasion with all mounts through their movement abilities.
A recipe to make an ascended sword with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
A tasty treat for your skimmer.
A recipe to make an ascended pistol with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Given by Aksim, upon completion of the Sparking the Flame story mission.
You have collected Noran's final chest key!
Explore a ruined Sunspear shrine in the Desolation to acquire this relic.

It's not like the captain will be needing it soon."
—Cin

This item only has value as part of a collection."
This item is not for sale.
<c=@abilitytype>Engage.</c> Pounce at your foe, damaging them and any nearby foes.
A recipe to make an ascended mace with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
In the garden of dawn, a secret grove is infused by light.
When you apply poison to a foe, steal some health from them.
Summoned or carried toys and miniature toy companions.
A recipe to make an ascended trident with Seraph (+Condition Damage, +Precision, +Concentration, and +Healing Power) stats.
Eye for an Eye, Child for a Child
Purchase this relic from Priest Hakim in Crystal Oasis.
